query:
SELECT 
            users.id as user_id,
            users.displayname,
            users.handle,
            users.following,
            users.followers,

            -- If is followed by user
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM follows
                WHERE follows.follower_id = $2
                AND follows.followee_id = users.id
            ) as "is_followed!: bool"
        FROM users WHERE users.id = $1;
